data.title: Xtreme Zone
data.meta_description: Now more than just go-karting, Xtreme Zone offers axe throwing and virtual reality racing simulators as well! Visit us for Delaware karting.
data.text:
Now more than just Delaware Indoor Karting.

Weâ€™re delighted to be able to offer thrill-seekers several different outlets for high adrenaline fun. Whether you put the pedal to the metal on our quarter mile track with 9 turns and speeds up to 40mph, or you prefer the virtual version with any sports car of your choice on hundreds of different tracks, you and your party will have a blast. Looking for a new challenge? Toss an axe on our new range at a variety of digitally-projected targets from zombies to tic-tac-toe.

With activities to choose from, a snack bar, and a team dedicated to making your outing a blast, Xtreme Zone is the perfect choice for family outings, birthday parties, or even team building with coworkers! Register now or get in touch to plan your next event.
